comments:
I had hit Save then immediately hit the debug toolbar button.
I received a dialog box telling me an error had occurred. The
exception below was in the log. The perspective did switch to
the debug perspective, but I don't recall if the app started
running or not.

I have not been able to recreate this as of yet.
